Song.title: Thy Way, Not Mine
Song.copyright: Words by Horatius Bonar Music & additional words by Joel Sczebel Â© 2008 Sovereign Grace Worship

Arrangement.text:
Intro: [G | C | G | C]
Verse 1: Thy [G]way, not [Em]mine, O [C]Lord How[G]ever [Em]dark it [C]be Lead [G]me by [Em]Thine own [C] [ ]hand Choose [G]out the [Em]path for [C]me, for me [G | C | G | C]
Verse 2: Smooth [G]let it [Em]be or [C]rough It [G]will still [Em]be the [C]best Wind[G]ing or [Em]straight, it [C] [ ]leads Right [G]onward [Em]to Thy [C]rest
Chorus 1: [C] [ ]I dare not [Em]choose my [G]lot [C] [ ]I would not, [G]if I [D]might [C] [ ]Choose Thou for [Em]me, my [G]God [Am] [ ] So [C]I can walk aright [G | C | G | C]
Verse 3: Take [G]Thou my [Em]cup, and [C]it With [G]joy or [Em]sorrow [C]fill As [G]best to [Em]Thee may [C] [ ]seem Choose [G]Thou my [Em]good and [C]ill
Chorus 2: [C] [ ]Not mine, not [Em]mine the [G]choice [C] [ ]In all things [G]great or [D]small [C] [ ]Be Thou my [Em]guide, my [G]strength [Am] [ ] My [C]wisdom [D]and my [Am]all,{,} my [C]wisdom and my [G]all
Tag: [C | Em Bm | C | G D | C | Em Bm | Am]
Arrangement.searchtext: intro verse 1 thy way not mine o lord however dark it be lead me by thine own hand choose out the path for me for me verse 2 smooth let it be or rough it will still be the best winding or straight it leads right onward to thy rest chorus 1 i dare not choose my lot i would not if i might choose thou for me my god so i can walk aright verse 3 take thou my cup and it with joy or sorrow fill as best to thee may seem choose thou my good and ill chorus 2 not mine not mine the choice in all things great or small be thou my guide my strength my wisdom and my all my wisdom and my all tag
